reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 173/07: ANNUAL DEADLINES FOR BY-LAWS ADOPTING OPTIONAL CLASSES
reg_info.reg_name_text: ANNUAL DEADLINES FOR BY-LAWS ADOPTING OPTIONAL CLASSES
reg_info.act_under: Assessment Act   Loi sur l’évaluation foncière

content.content: 1. For the 2009 taxation year, June 30, 2009 is prescribed as the later deadline for the purposes of subsection 2 (3.2) of the Act. O. Reg. 148/09, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the 2009 taxation year, June 30, 2009 is prescribed as the later deadline for the purposes of subsection 2 (3.2) of the Act. O. Reg. 148/09, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 173/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 173/07, s. 2.
